quotestore.quote: Women are the largest untapped reservoir of talent in the world.
quotestore.author: Hillary Clinton
quotestore.quote: I'm not afraid of anything. That's just the way I am.
quotestore.author: Paul Walker
quotestore.quote: I've known for years that resentments don't hurt the person we resent, but they do hurt us.
quotestore.author: Anne Lamott
quotestore.quote: The only antidote to mental pain is physical suffering.
quotestore.author: Karl Marx
quotestore.quote: Where ignorance is our master, there is no possibility of real peace.
quotestore.author: Dalai Lama
quotestore.quote: Design is a funny word. Some people think design means how it looks. But of course, if you dig deeper, it's really how it works.
quotestore.author: Steve Jobs
quotestore.quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
quotestore.author: Mother Teresa
quotestore.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
quotestore.author: Henry Ford
quotestore.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
quotestore.author: Rumi
quotestore.quote: Success is not a function of the size of your title but the richness of your contribution
quotestore.author: Robin S. Sharma
